table.name: vtiger_whatsapp
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_whatsapp` ( `modcommentsid` int(11) DEFAULT NULL, `commentcontent` text, `related_to` varchar(100) NOT NULL, `parent_comments` varchar(100) default NULL ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8

table.name: vtiger_whatsappcf
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_whatsappcf` ( `modcommentsid` int(11) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`modcommentsid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
